reviews.review: Avengers: Infinity War does a good job of taking moving parts from the 18 previous Marvel films and putting them together into one, cohesive machine. Each superhero gets his or her chance to shine, and Thanos holds his own as the antagonist. This movie can't really stand on its own, but is has an epic feel, as well as enough humor & action to keep fans of this cinematic universe entertained.
This movie was beyond epic. To say it was it "heartbreaking" and "hilarious" is an understatement. My life will never be same again.
The most fun I have ever experienced watching a movie.

First of all, MARVEL is a really big part of my life, it inspires me, keeps me motivated, and it makes my life even more complete. I am very proud and happy for all of their success, since the first film "IRON MAN" when it was released on 2008 and until now they got what they deserved: ACHIEVEMENTS, HAPPINESS AND SUCCESS. I am very very proud to say that i am a huge supporter of marvel since before and until now i will always going to support them no matter what happens!!! 

So for all of you who haven't seen the movie, this is my review!!

AVENGERS INFINITY WAR!! 
- For me, INFINITY WAR is a MASTERPIECE. No doubts!! No regrets!! 10/10 for me. Excellent film!! the character developments, epic fight scenes (YESSSS!!!), the visuals and everything, good atmosphere plus the SOLID CAST!! (I loved them!!) ??, this film is a funny, emotional, intense, outstanding, unpredictable and a mind blowing story!! Seriously!! WOW!! KUDOS TO THE TEAM BEHIND THIS FILM!! It's really brilliant! They really deserved all the success and achievements!! Thank you for this MARVEL STUDIOS!! And also I can't wait for avengers 4!! but i'm really looking forward for ant man and the wasp and of course for captain marvel!! and lastly, i highly recommend to everyone to see this film in cinemas!! It's WORTH IT! and also don't mind the spoilers and DON'T MIND THE CRITICS!! BUT DO MIND THE AUDIENCE, WE LOVED IT! Go see for yourself guys!! Support their efforts!! ?? That's all!! Once again, thank you MARVEL STUDIOS FOR THIS MASTERPIECE!! 

PS: the characters are all my favorites. THEY'RE ALL BALANCED AND I'M VERY HAPPY FOR THEM ??

A majestic spectacle. 10 years of world building and finally it leads to grand epic conclusion of a chapter in the MCU. Though the ending may not satisfy all people, it surely is amazing and epic in a way that had never been achieved in cinema.

Terrible terrible movie. Plot is contrived. Acting is worse than normal. Very sad "conclusion" of the MCU movies. No spoilers here but this movie failed to provide an acceptable or logical continuation of the main plot line by tossing aside what drives the main characters.

In a film that was supposed to deliver the emotional punch that was supposed to carry us into a new Avengers in 2019 that was supposed to be a second movie and not a sequel- well it only halfway delivered that - and that was not supposed to happen either.

Infinity War, in all its pomp and circumstance, delivers as any Marvel movie can its action and humor.  Its self allusions, comedic relief, and moments of intensity make the movie watchable, enjoyable, and fun.  But the stakes have risen - these heroes' lives are at stake, and yet, the payoff for this film leaves you empty- the word I have been seeing around the web is "hollow"- which is very accurate.

I should be very sad/upset/depressed/angry/distraught/etc right now because (insert hero(es) name here) died.  I should be wondering how the Avengers are going to regroup and continue with (name) gone.  But we aren't going to be doing that.

Instead, we have to wait another year with a little less coin in our pocket.  This movie raised the stakes and did not deliver (even with its ending, we all know...)  It is good.  See it.  But wait unti May 2, 2019 if you can... if you catch my drift.
Cliffhanger of the year, after 10 years of waiting. Guess this cash cow's not done yet, not that I'm complaining.
